name: Parkinson Pharmaceuticals
overview:
Established in the year 2007, at Mohali (Chandigarh, India), we, “Parkinson Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd.,” are a leading name in the pharmaceutical industry, engaged in manufacturing, distributing, wholesaling and supplying a wide range of Injectables, Tablets, Capsules, Syrups and Ointments. Offered medicines are processed in the most hygiene environment under the supervision of our pharmaceutical experts. Our professionals use quality tested ingredients in the formulations of these drugs.

Infrastructure: Keeping in mind effective formulation of drugs, we have developed an advanced infrastructural facility that comprises high-end production laboratory, quality testing unit, research & development department and warehousing & packaging unit. This stat-of-the-art facility is well-equipped with the latest machines and technology. Further, this unit is developed in a synchronized manner, so that each process can be carried out in an efficient manner.

Our Team: We are fostered with a team of highly experienced team of professionals, who enable us to meet several requirements of clients in the most efficient and economical manner. Our professionals are highly experienced and possess rich expertise in their specific domain.

Our Quality: We are renowned in the industry as a quality centric organization, which follows each & every rule defined by the pharmaceutical industry. In order to maintain strict quality standards, we have developed a stringent quality procedure that is rigorously followed at each step of entire process. We have maintained a high-end quality testing unit that is integrated with numerous testing instruments.

Our Products: Piperacillin Tazobactam 1.125 gm Methylprednisolone Sodium Succinate 40 mg Ceftriaxone-1gm Ceftriaxone Sulbactam 1.5 gm Cefoperazone Sulbactam 1.5 gm
